# CMAttachmentMode

**Type Alias**

The mode to use when propagating attachments.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias CMAttachmentMode = UInt32
```

## Discussion

Set these attributes when adding attachments to a [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMAttachmentBearer] object.

## Modes

- **kCMAttachmentMode_ShouldNotPropagate**: A mode that doesn’t propagate attachments to another object.
- **kCMAttachmentMode_ShouldPropagate**: A mode that propagates attachments to another object.

## Data Types

- **CMAttachmentBearerProtocol**: A protocol for objects that can carry attachments.
- **CMAttachmentBearer**: An object that can carry attachments.
